preface: To help understand the logic and flow of updating a student's status, a flowchart was made showcasing the steps and decisions administrative personell take to achieve this.
title: Flowchart student status
method: To create the flowchart draw.io was used. The interviews and product showcase were used as a guide to help create the flowchart.
findings: View the flowchart using the button below.
conclusion: Creating the flowchart helped create a better technical understanding of the PARS features. It also helps in other areas such as design, and user experience. All steps taken are mapped out, enabling for a more comprehensive final product.

sources.title: CMD Methods Pack - find a combination of research methods that suit your needs. (n.d.).
